revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement the changes requested by Sampson and finalize.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement the changes requested by Sampson and finalize.
General - Update: the Mirończuk ed.pr. is biblio 95486, pp. 4-6: please remove 95233 and update with the correct number.
General - Update: the Mirończuk ed.pr. is biblio 95486, pp. 4-6: please remove 95233 and update with the correct number.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Some housekeeping is needed. Text: ll.1-2 first epsilon missing from Neireus' name in both lines; move apostrophe to after *apostrophe* markup (lest it appear from the apparatus that the scribe wrote two apostrophes); change dot in l.1 to *high-punctus*; l.4 δέ*apostrophe* --> δ ὲ(΄) ; l.5 Νίσυρον --> Νείσυρον; l.5 dot iota in εἶχον as well; encode scribal deletion in l.6 as a correction; change scribal accent in l.9 to grave; l.10 --> νῦν δ’ αὖ and --> Ἄρ̣γος; encode scribal deletion in l.11 as a correction and change regularization to {εν}ἐνέμοντ̣[ο]; l.13 --> δ’ ἐκαλέοντο; change last line number from 15 > 13. Important notes on the textual tradition should be added from the ed.pr. into the commentary. Metadata: first biblio item (for Mironczuk's ed.pr.) needs to be created and the biblio number updated (I'll submit this item after voting); Note for finalization: this is columbia.apis.p370.

Important notes on the textual tradition should be added from the ed.pr. into the commentary.
